header_text: You are currently have a lot going on with work. Your friend who you have not seen in a while has asked you to hang out the night before a deadline. You know that you need to prioritize your work but worry that your friend will be upset for not making time for them.

elements.text: You realize that you will have greater flexibility in the next few weeks to see your friend and that they will understand that you need to...
